column2: the cocktails sound quite unique and tasty with their infusion techniques
column3: but the cocktails we tried were rather bland
column4: especially in comparison to how I expected they would taste based on the menu description. We were very impressed with the food quality and the freshness of the food. What we were less than impressed with was the creativity of some of the dishes
column5: and so when we received the food
column6: we were very impressed with some of it
column7: but less than impressed with the rest.
